lines.text: Hey, if youse guys need kissin' *I'll* kiss you - wit' a gun-butt!
D'you know what you can do when you see a shooting star?
You can kiss the girl you love.
Hello Yank, welcome to a very merry little war. And now how about a wee drop for the King and Uncle Sam?
Luck or no luck, when your time comes, you're going to get it. Now, I've got to go out and do a flock of figure eights before chow.
